hotels.title: Mexico Five-Star Private Pool Villas on Diamond Zone Cliffs
hotels.description: Perched on the dazzling cliffs of the Diamond Zone, the luxury and comfort of the five-star Banyan Tree Cabo Marqués is only matched by its breathtaking views. Concealed within a private gated community, this spectacular resort is the pinnacle of seclusion and relaxation. Indulge in uninterrupted views of the Pacific Ocean while unwinding in your own private heated pool - the perfect setting for a moment of peace. Make the most out of the revitalising experience with specially crafted relaxing bath rituals or welcome the sun with graceful yoga sessions. Explore the intricacies of the dishes of each different Mexican region and try the finest Mexican tequila and mezcal at the hotel's four dining venues. Kids will be excited with their own tepee in-villa, while parents can soak away their stress at the award-winning Banyan Tree Cabo Marqués Spa. Head down the magnificent cliffs to explore Acapulco and Cabo Marqués, filled with natural wonders and vibrant events for an immersive experience of the Mexican Pacific coast.
